text: The Minimighty Kids (Les Minijusticiers) is a French-animated television series based on a comic book series by Hélène Bruller and Zep about 78 children that magically gain superpowers based on each of their flaws and differences. A second season titled The Minimighty Squad (La Brande De Minijusticiers) centers around 5 of these kids that keep their powers because of them wishing on a magic star. It aired on CBBC in the UK. == References == == Other websites == *YouTube channel Category:French television series
title: The Minimighty Kids
